q: '' said Mike Pence in a speech on the House floor.`` It would ensure that abortion providers are not subsidized with federal tax dollars.''`` Now, let me say,'' Mike Pence continued, to be very clear, Mr. Speaker, this legislation does not cut one penny from title X family planning funding. I applaud much of the important work that is done at title X clinics across this country: breast cancer screening, HIV protection, education, counseling, pregnancy diagnosis. This legislation simply prevents family planning funding from aiding organizations that profit from the abortion industry.

TIM BALE, PROFESSOR OF POLITICS, UNIVERSITY OF SUSSEX It's obviously damaging because Andy Coulson was a very effective media operator so he is losing someone who was incredibly useful to the David Cameron operation. It is also incredibly damaging because it questions Mr David Cameron 's judgment and that for a politician is one of the worst things you can possibly do. Being a politician is all about... picking the right people to do the right job and the decision to appoint Andy Coulson was controversial in the first place and it's clearly a big, big judgment call that David Cameron has got wrong. `` I think Andy Coulson was somebody who could help the Conservative Party... produce a message which was, if you like,` pub ready', which resonated with ordinary people. Staff Writer Thursday, January 27, 2011; 10:52 PM Mike Pence ( R-Ind.) will not run for president in 2012 but has left the door open to running for governor of the Hoosier State. In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana, Mike Pence said in a letter to supporters first reported Thursday by the Indianapolis Star.`` We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.'' a fictitious substance called`` red mercury'' that, according to local lore, can be found in the throats of ancient mummies. Some people think it has magical powers and can be used to summon spirits.
